data.quote: Be brave. Take risks. Nothing can substitute experience.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: It’s the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: If you think adventure is dangerous, try routine; it’s lethal.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: One day you'll wake up and there won't be any more time to do the things you've always wanted. Do it now.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: You are what you believe yourself to be.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: You can't wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club.
data.author: Jack London

data.quote: Life is not always a matter of holding good cards, but sometimes, playing a poor hand well.
data.author: Jack London

data.quote: The proper function of man is to live, not to exist. I shall not waste my days in trying to prolong them. I shall use my time.
data.author: Jack London
